HEADERS.TITLE: Randy's Portfolio - Frontend Developer
HEADERS.DESCRIPTION: Randy's portfolio: Frontend Developer specialized in creating attractive and functional user interfaces. Proficient in HTML, CSS, Sass, Tailwind, JavaScript, React, Astro, among other technologies. Available for collaborations and freelance projects.

SECTION_HEADER.PARAGRAPH_1: Hello! I am a self-taught individual with a great passion for technology and web development. Over the past two years, I have dedicated myself to learning independently.
SECTION_HEADER.PARAGRAPH_2: This has allowed me to acquire solid knowledge and experience in frontend development, creating a variety of personal projects. I focus on designing user interfaces that are functional, attractive, and accessible, reflecting my love for programming and my desire to continue improving my skills.

MonkeyType.TITLE: Monkey Type
MonkeyType.DESCRIPTION: Clone of the Monkey Type website to practice typing speed and accuracy, providing performance metrics such as words per minute (WPM) and accuracy.

ToDoList.TITLE: ToDo List
ToDoList.DESCRIPTION: Website to create, modify, delete and save your pending tasks, with the option to filter them by progress, or by name.

FormularioValidaciones.TITLE: Form With Validations
FormularioValidaciones.DESCRIPTION: Simple form in which validations are made to know if the requested data are being entered correctly.

SECTION_CONTACT.TITLE: CONTACT
SECTION_CONTACT.TEXT: Hi! If you liked my portfolio and want to contact me to work together on projects or develop an idea, feel free to write me through the following means.
